mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.accmeth_code AS "accmethCode", a.accmeth_name AS "accmethName", a.ext_field1 AS "extField1", a.ext_field2 AS "extField2", a.ext_field3 AS "extField3", a.remark AS "remark"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM doc_accmeth a
AND a.accmeth_code LIKE '%'||#{accmethCode}||'%' '%'+#{accmethCode}+'%' CONCAT('%', #{accmethCode}, '%')
AND a.accmeth_name LIKE '%'||#{accmethName}||'%' '%'+#{accmethName}+'%' CONCAT('%', #{accmethName}, '%')
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO doc_accmeth( accmeth_code, accmeth_name, ext_field1, ext_field2, ext_field3, remark ) VALUES ( #{accmethCode}, #{accmethName}, #{extField1}, #{extField2}, #{extField3}, #{remark} )
mapper.update: UPDATE doc_accmeth SET accmeth_code = #{accmethCode}, accmeth_name = #{accmethName}, ext_field1 = #{extField1}, ext_field2 = #{extField2}, ext_field3 = #{extField3}, remark = #{remark} WHERE id = #{id}
